title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 346.4 - Required authorization
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 346.4 - Required authorization

State Regulations

All rules and procedures of the chair, relating to
authorization for special services as set forth in section
325-1.4
of this Title, are made
applicable to requests for authorization for special chiropractic services to
the extent that they are not inconsistent with the provisions of section 13-1
of the Workers' Compensation Law, and the other provisions duly promulgated
thereunder. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
346.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
